author: Peter Schacknow
title: Stocks making the biggest moves in the premarket: Gap, KB Home, Lululemon, Toyota & more
description: The stocks making the biggest moves in premarket trading include Gap, KB Home, Lululemon, Toyota, and more.
content:
Take a look at some of the biggest movers in the premarket:
Gap (GPS) The parent of Gap, Old Navy, and Banana Republic pulled the full-year forecast that it had issued earlier this month and also suspended its dividend, as all its stores close due to the cor… [+3284 chars]
